description: A delicious and healthy salad filled with all the green fruits and veggies!
name: The Greenest Chopped Salad
recipeIngredient: 6 cups chopped greens, your favorite kind
1 cup green grapes, cut in half
2 tablespoons chopped fresh herbs, your favorite kind

recipeInstructions.text: Place all dressing ingredients into a jar and whisk or shake until combined, set aside.

Place chopped greens into a large bowl and top with the remaining chopped salad ingredients. Drizzle salad with desired amount of dressing and toss until combined. You could also just top each individual salad servings with desired amount of dressing.

video.description:
This really is The Greenest Chopped Salad!  It's packed with all my favorite green fruits and veggies and topped off with a fresh herb dressing!  It's gluten free, vegan and so healthy!

Get the recipe here: https://www.shelikesfood.com/greenest-chopped-salad/
video.name: How to make The Greenest Chopped Salad
